Hi Chris, unfortunately I'm not aware of any work applying NEAT to HTMs, =
so apparently not much has happened in that area in the past five years.  I=
f you do something along those lines I'd be interested to hear about it.

k=
en

--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, "Chris Garrett" <garrerc@...> wrote:
>
> I=
'm glad someone brought this up (nearly 5 years ago!).  I haven't seen anyt=
hing where this might have been done, though.  Has there been any progress =
in combining concepts from NEAT and HTMs in that time?
>
